From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron remembers a time long ago, when he was barely a century old. He
was ammasing an army for a strike.

Megatron and Bludgeon aproach a Cybertronian training Academy. "Well,
here we are Megatron," Bludgeon says. "Yes, and now we recruit,"
Megatron adds, holding up his newly configured cannon. He takes aim, and
lets the awesome energy build up, and then rip a hole into the side of a
large building. Bludgeon transforms, and enters, tearing the place apart
with his tank mode, filling the place with smoke. Megatron follows. 

Once inside he holds up his cannon arm, "Greetings Cybertronians, I am
Megatron. Today I give anyone of you a chance to fullfill your training,
and join me and the Decepticons." Megatron remembers, a commanding
officer stepped forward, and offered some kind of resistance. It lasted
as long as it took for him to rip him in two with a blast from his
Fusion Cannon. The troops looked at him with fear, and all he could do
was smile.
